analyse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it
analyse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She still needs to analyse the data.
You need to sit down and analyse why you feel so upset.
Joe had never tried to analyze their relationship.
